entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Laval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
